sentences.sContent: Thus, sodium hydroxide was used in this work for the pretreatment of ramie fiber.
sentences.sContent_eng: Thus, sodium hydroxide was used in this work for the pretreatment of ramie fiber.
sentences.sCn: 因此，氢氧化钠是在这项工作中所使用的预处理苎麻纤维。

sentences.sContent: Precious metals: hydroxide precipitation and sedimentation plus precious metal recovery, e. g. evaporation, ion exchange, etc.
sentences.sContent_eng: Precious metals: hydroxide precipitation and sedimentation plus precious metal recovery, e. g. evaporation, ion exchange, etc.
sentences.sCn: 贵金属：氢氧化物沉淀+贵金属回收，如蒸发，离子交换等等。

sentences.sContent: The former includes graphite metallic disulfide etc; and the latter consists of layered silicate metallic double hydroxide etc.
sentences.sContent_eng: The former includes graphite metallic disulfide etc; and the latter consists of layered silicate metallic double hydroxide etc.
sentences.sCn: 前者包括石墨、金属硫化物等；后者包括层状硅酸盐、金属双氢氧化物等。

trans.tranOther: a chemical  compound  that contains an oxygen atom combined with a  hydrogen  atom
